en.label: Expense Approver
en.help:
References an employee record. Sets the person who approves the employees expense reports and purchase requests.
If you have set a supervisor, you can NOT set an approver. 
In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

en.label: Class
en.help:
References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Classes.
This field is required when the Make Classes Mandatory preference is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

en.label: Currency
en.help: The currency for an employee automatically defaults to the base currency of the associated subsidiary or company.  This currency must be used for transactions with this employee.

en.label: Department
en.help:
References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Departments.
This field is required when Make Departments Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

en.label: Ethnicity
en.help:
Select the employee's ethnicity. 
    You can create a new ethnicity category at <_TABNAME=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > Employee Related Lists.

en.label: Initials
en.help: NetSuite automatically completes this field as you enter first, middle and last names.If you want to make changes to an employee's initials, enter up to three letters in this field.

en.label: Location
en.help:
References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations.
In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

en.label: Require Password Change On Next Login
Subsidiary
en.help:
Select the subsidiary to associate with this employee. You cannot enter transactions for this employee unless a subsidiary is assigned.
If you select this employee on time transactions, the transaction is associated with this subsidiary. The employee is able to access only information associated with this subsidiary.
Note: Once a transaction has posted for the employee, you are not able to change the subsidiary selected on the employee record.

en.label: Supervisor
en.help:
References an employee record. This employee will approve expense reports and purchase requests.
In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

en.label: Workplace
en.help:
Select 
the workplace where this employee works.The address of this workplace 
will be used to define the taxes you are required to withhold and pay for 
this employee.
